Row.Text: Fio
A Fairy who Supports the Knight's Adventure in a New Figure

With help of the Princess Knight, Landosol leaders can unlock a unique "Union Brust" ability which provides powerful bonuses. Ameth guides the Princess Knight no matter how everything goes, and save all his memory till the end of the world.

Ameth guides her followers in the dream world to discover the truth about the world. They can found a Religion quickly with extra starting [ICON_Faith] Faith and the free [ICON_GreatProphet] Great Prophet in early game, and earn Kokkoro as a loyal guard. As the game progresses, they can trigger [ICON_TechBoosted] Eurekas and [ICON_CivicBoosted] Inspirations of new Eras they enter to boost their technology research and civic study. Build Guildhouses and finish Enter Dream World project to collect [ICON_GreatWork_Portrait] Memory Piece Great Works so that they can effectively build up their city yields which support all victory paths in mid-game. There is no need to worry much about Era Score: if they are in a Dark Age, Ameth will do her best to help!
What you just saw is little more than a dream. No need to remember it, you'll forget soon enough anyway.
So I felt the need to to help you and I will. You shall thank me, will you?
You will have many friends even if I reject to be one of them, so it is not bad to keep our relationship as is.
I never thought that we can become so intimate like how we are now when we first meet, and I hereby request you to accept my friendship.
See, I will try my best to support you.
I am not going to leave you alone.
Well? Just try and see if you can defeat me.
The world might be doomed if I just sit by, and that is a good reason why I can't do so, right?
To show my respect... I treated your delegation with the utmost regard.
You'd better not come. I won't tell you any detail about it and please don't speculate.
My diplomatic delegation brings you some dreams which are magnificent and made only for you. Relax and enjoy!
It makes no sense for us to argue.
How can things happen like this... What is wrong with you? (Denounces You)
I am... Well, you can call me Ameth. That is what everyone calls me lately. Here's hoping your life, your reality, turns out to be a happy one.
Now I can finally take someone to the place I want to go... Will you visit my city nearby?
OK, thanks.
You must have been to every corner of your capital and know some tips for traveling there. Does it have any delicacies made without monster meat? Also please don't count crêpes made by Akira.
Continue doing what you can to help those near you. I'm sure one day you'll be rewarded for your efforts.
The bonds you've formed with others will be your salvation. Those connections are your greatest weapon. Try not to forget.
Would you like to form an alliance?
I cherish you, my dear friend. But move your army at my borders away, or I will pull no punches if they bother me.
No, everyone...! I shouldn't be defeated here!
OK, thanks.
You probably don't understand a word I'm saying.
Glad to see you again.
I hope all of us can have peace as soon as possible.
In real world, you can change nothing with mere wishes.
All our troops are living people... We cannot let this twisted world kill them. Let us make peace right now.
If so, you can go fix this world's distortions. I know you can do it, and will support you.
Being separated is actually some kind of blessing. I suggest you stop your actions.
I know this might be inappropriate, but please forgive me. Please save this world together, and let our army pass through to fight against our enemies!
Ameth approves of your alliance-making
Ameth is unhappy you are in so few alliances
Guide Fairy
Respects those who form multiple alliances. Dislikes those with few alliances.
Civilopedia articles are not translated yet.
Rifàre-Piuma
If killed in combat, receive a free unit of the same kind in your capital.
Enter Dream World
Enter Dream

If the game still has available [ICON_GreatArtist] Guild Members to create [ICON_GreatWork_Portrait] Memory Piece Great Work, earn one upon completion. If all [ICON_GreatArtist] Guild Members has been recruited, grants 300 [ICON_Faith] Faith. All players can earn 24 [ICON_GreatArtist] Guild Members in total in a game.
Memory Piece
[ICON_GreatWork_Portrait] Memory Piece

Guild Member
Each [ICON_GreatArtist] Guild Member generates a [ICON_GreatWork_Portrait] Memory Piece Great Work when activated.
{LOC_UNIT_LANDSOL_KOKKORO_AMES_NAME}
Acceleration
Can scale Cliff walls. Kokkoro and units within 2 tiles have {LOC_ABILITY_LANDSOL_KOKKORO_AMES_RECEIVE_ACCELERATION_DESCRIPTION}
+1 [ICON_Movement] Movement.
Civilopedia articles are not translated yet.
Wall of Spirits
Kokkoro and units within 2 tiles have {LOC_ABILITY_LANDSOL_KOKKORO_AMES_RECEIVE_WALL_OF_SPIRITS_DESCRIPTION}
+7 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when defending.
Civilopedia articles are not translated yet.
Blazingly Bright

If this unit captures a city or is adjacent to a city when it is captured, the city will automatically adopt the Conquistador player's Religion as the dominant Religion. Kokkoro and units within 2 tiles spread your Religion to nearby cities when defeating a unit belonging to an enemy civilization or city-state.
Your Religion is spread to nearby cities when defeating a unit belonging to an enemy civilization or city-state.
Civilopedia articles are not translated yet.
Spirits' Inspiration

Combat victories of units within 2 tiles provide [ICON_Culture] Culture equal to 50% of the [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength of the defeated unit (on Standard Speed). Combat victories of Kokkoro have this bonus doubled.
Combat victories provide [ICON_Culture] Culture equal to 50% of the [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength of the defeated unit (on Standard Speed).
Civilopedia articles are not translated yet.
Spring Gale
+10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength vs. land units. Kokkoro and units within 2 tiles are not affected by enemy zone of control.
Not affected by enemy zone of control.
Civilopedia articles are not translated yet.
Triple Slash
+1 additional attack per turn if [ICON_Movement] Movement allows. Kokkoro and units within 2 tiles can move after attacking.
Can move after attacking.
Civilopedia articles are not translated yet.
Aurora Sanctuaty
+10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength in all situations. Kokkoro and units within 2 tiles have +10 HP healing and heals at the end of every turn.
+10 HP healing. Heals at the end of every turn.
Civilopedia articles are not translated yet.
+7 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength on a continent other than your home continent.
+1 [ICON_Movement] Movement on a continent other than your home continent.
+5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength from Guildhouse (Self Defense Group). This number is doubled when this unit is in your territory or adjacent to your territory.
+50% experience in Combat from Guildhouse (Self Defense Group).
+5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength from Guildhouse (Self Defense Group)
+5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when in your territory or adjacent to your territory
+7 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength on a continent other than your home continent
Princess Explorer
Tries to explore the map, likes civilizations from her home continent, and wants to expand to all continents. Doesn’t like civilizations on continents where she has no city.
Maho is pleased you share the same home continent
Maho wants to expand to a continent you occupy
Don't panic. In a fairy tale, wisdom is the key to weather crises.
I would like to tell all people in Maho Maho Kingdom about how this adventure is when I finish my trip.
An adventure, with scents of plants, various kinds of animals, wet soil and traps awaiting... I feel excited about it.
Though I am so awkward that always make troubles, I hope I can help you.
You? I cannot trust you.
I hope we can attempt to achieve harmony... A world where all people can live happily is like something that only exist in a fairy tale, but that is exactly what I want to create.
Hehe. It is just like a fairy tale! I look forward to your friendship.
What... How can you be so merciless? I feel disappointed.
Whoever could it be that is after us? I can't see how we could provoked this.... Hmm?
I can't bear to watch you trampling over our sphere of influence. We will do what we can to resist.
As the princess of Maho Maho Kingdom, I hope to communicate with you friendly!
Wow, someone uninvited has come... No.
It would be great if our delegation can meet you, an honorable king, greet you courteously and have an elegant tea party with you.
Trying to start a war, are you?
I trust you have an explanation for all this? (Denounces You)
Who might you be? Pardon me. My accent is not used that much these days, but I cannot ignore our tradition since I am a princess.
Let us know each other better! And I want to invite you to visit our city nearby!
So let us go!
Well, as a step of international communication, I would like to invite you to speak of our capitals.
Would you like to form an alliance?
Don't you think it is inappropriate to tread too close to borders of another nation without permission? Won't you think you can do whatever you want?
Oops... I am defeated...
No need to thank me.
You are troublesome.
Nice to meet you.
Let forgive each other for what we have done and unite again.
We still must wage this war. Wars will break out again sooner or later if the fundamental conflicts between us remain untreated.
We cannot pretend what has been done never happened before. But we must lead the war between us to a peaceful end.
We will do our best to help. Feel free to tell us your need.
I feel worried for you. No, you cannot wage wars unrestrainedly.
As a princess, I cannot leave my enemies out of control. Please, mighty king, allow us to pass through your lands.

With help of the Princess Knight, Landosol leaders can unlock a unique "Union Brust" ability which provides powerful bonuses. Explorer Maho explores the world actively and expand their cities to every continent.

Explorer Maho uses strong recon units to explore the map as soon as possible. Once they found a city on a new continent, they can instantly receive a free Settler to help them truly settle down in the new world. Build Maho Maho Camp unique building in these cities can boost [ICON_Culture] Culture and [ICON_Gold] Gold output of them. Their flourishing cities are beneficial for any kind of victory.
Civilopedia articles are not translated yet.
